title: fried courgette flowers
description: Creamy mascarpone and ricotta add a touch of luxury to this simple vegetable risotto. Omit the deep-fried courgette flowers to make a quick mid-week meal.
ingredients: 1 litre/1¾ pint chicken or vegetable stock
40g/1½oz parmesan (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), freshly grated
flavourless oil (such as vegetable oil), for deep frying
